targets.expr: max by (name, namespace) (stoker_controller_gateways_synced{namespace=~"$namespace", name=~"$cr"}) * 100 + max by (name, namespace) (stoker_controller_gateways_discovered{namespace=~"$namespace", name=~"$cr"})

panels.description: Whether the Ignition designer is blocking sync.
panels.title: Designer Blocked

panels.description: Status of each condition on the GatewaySync CR.
panels.title: Condition Status

panels.description: Per-gateway sync status and last sync time.
panels.title: Gateway Status

panels.description: Duration of the last file sync operation per agent pod.
panels.title: Avg Sync Duration

panels.description: Duration of the last git clone or fetch operation per agent pod.
panels.title: Avg Git Fetch Duration

panels.description: Duration of the last Ignition scan API call per agent pod.
panels.title: Avg Scan Duration

panels.description: Total syncs completed by agents in this namespace.
panels.title: Total Syncs

panels.description: Files added, modified, and deleted in the last sync.
panels.title: File Changes (Last Sync)

panels.description: Number of active Ignition designer sessions.
panels.title: Designer Sessions

panels.description: Time from pod start to first successful sync (gateway commissioning).
panels.title: Avg Gateway Startup

panels.description: Timestamp of the last sync and whether it was successful.
panels.title: Last Sync Time
